page.title: 03Wytham: then and now.
page.content: In Wytham,Hubert holds 5 hides of villagers'land from the abbot. There were 4,and they paid tax with the hides of the manor. The thanes hide was exempt,but he could not go where he would. Land for 2 ploughs. In lordship 1\ ploughs; 4 villagers and 11 smallholders. Meadow,64 acres. Wytham our entry(1985) ______________________ Now, Wytham village covers 806 acres 151 people live there. There are 59 households.88% rent their houses from the University:12% own their own houses. 20% of the present population are O.A.P. 14% are under 16 years old. 73% own their own cars.In 10 years, the population has increased by 2.01%
